item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ingrid Bergman
item.description: "Happiness is good health and a bad memory." -- Ingrid Bergman

item.title: Sarah add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "This above all: to thine own self be true, And it must follow, as the night the day, Thou canst not then be false to any man." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Henry van Dyke
item.description: "Time is Too Slow for those who Wait, Too Swift for those who Fear, Too Long for those who Grieve, Too Short for those who Rejoice; But for those who Love, Time is not." -- Henry van Dyke

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History will be kind to me for I intend to write it." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Never, never, never give in!" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "Never give in. Never give in. Never, never, never, never—in nothing, great or small, large or petty—never give in, except to convictions of honour and good sense. Never yield to force. Never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The earth laughs in flowers." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
